flawed_nl_solution:
Before Samuel walked across the porch, there were 331 - 223 = <<331-223=180>>180 dust particles.
Those 180 were 1/10 of the original amount, so there were 180 * 10 = <<180*10=1800>>1800 dust particles on the porch before Samuel swept.
#### 1800

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 108, not 180. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
